title: Acumen West Africa Fellowship For Emerging Leaders In West Africa 2025
description: Acumen invests in social entrepreneurs across the capital continuum and accompanies them on the journey to create transformational change. At Acumen Academy, we identify and prepare these leaders with the hard skills required to build scalable solutions to poverty and the harder skills of moral leadership to re imagine and build a better world. Our West Africa Acumen Fellowship is a transformative program that brings together a cohort of extraordinary in

title: Beijing Institute of Technology (BIT) 2025 Masters & PhD Scholarships
description: China has become one of the most popular studies abroad destinations for international students because of its long history and rich culture, and Beijing University ranks in the top 5 among Chinese universities.It provides an excellent platform for dedicated and talented students to enhance their career prospects by honing the skills they acquire during their academic journey. Beijing Institute of Technology  BIT , a leading Chinese university founded in 1940, offers an exceptional range of scholarships for international students for the 2025 academic year.The Chinese Government Scholarship offered by Beijing Institute of Technology University is a fully funded opportunity designed for international students.

title: Apply Now: World Trade Organization (WTO) Internship Program 2024
description: The World Trade Organization is an intergovernmental organization that regulates and facilitates international trade. Governments use the organization to establish, revise, and enforce the rules that govern international trade. The WTO is the world s largest international economic organization, with 164 member states representing over 98% of global trade and global GDP. The internship which provides a daily allowance of CHF 60  $62 – totalling $1860/month  to the candidates, aims to give young graduates the skills and experience to work in the WTO. The recruitment policy of the WTO is to seek to attract and retain staff members offering the highest standards of competence, efficiency and integrity.

title: DAAD/University of Ghana 2025 Masters Scholarship for African Students
description: Call for Master Scholarship Applications 2025 at West Africa Centre for Crop Improvement  WACCI , University of Ghana Master of Philosophy in Seed Science and Technology.  It has been agreed upon that DAAD cooperates with the West Africa Centre for Crop Improvement  WACCI  by offering up to 3 In Country and 6 In Region scholarships for Master studies .

title: Ryanair Group 2025 Commercial Graduate Programme
description: Do you want to join the best Graduate Programme in Aviation? Joining the the Ryanair Graduate Programme not only means joining Europe s Largest Airline Group but will give you the opportunity to learn from some of the most commercially astute, financially minded, and creative minds in the airline industry and you will forge relationships for life. Our unique programmes offer you to chance to rotate through a number of key business areas in your chosen programme, will get continued mentorship from our senior leadership team, be brought on a number of trips around the network to better understand Ryanair and it s opertaions and some well desevered nights out. The Programme: Within the Commercial Graduate Programme, you will get to do 4 rotations within the following areas:  Commercial Finance, Scheduling, Revenue Management  Yield  and Route Development Commercial Finance: Route Profitability reports Monthly market / competitor analysis Evaluate and propose new route opportunities Assist with research and planning projects Liaise with internal Finance department in Ryanair Scheduling: Optimum scheduling of Ryanair fleet Management of slot portfolios at coordinated airports Analyse schedule efficiency Yield: Achieve target load factors across a portfolio of routes Achieve and surpass revenue targets Conduct detailed market reviews, identifying potential threats and opportunities Propose proactive pricing and yield management strategies Liaise with internal Marketing department in Ryanair Route Development Manage and develop existing commercial relationships with airports Identify and champion new low cost markets and routes Liaise with internal Operations department in Ryanair

title: Amazons Operations Business Analyst Intern 2025
description: Amazon Operations is the backbone of the Amazon customer experience. With over 50 fulfilment centres, hundreds of delivery stations, and tens of thousands of employees, the team works together to efficiently deliver items to customers. In the fulfilment centres, millions of items are picked and packed annually, while delivery teams work to get orders to customers on time. Safety is the top priority, and the operations culture is defined by teamwork,

title: Call for PhD Application: DAAD University of Abomey-Calavi Scholarship For Sub Saharan African
description: The programme aims at fostering strong, internationally oriented higher education systems in Sub Saharan Africa with the capacity to contribute to sustainable development. To this end, scholarships are granted for development related Master or doctoral studies for in

title: Mundus MAPP 2025 Scholarship Program For International Students
description: Applications are now open for the 2025 2027 academic cycle. The Mundus MAPP Consortium has been supported by the Erasmus + action of the European Union. The Erasmus Mundus  EMJM  scholarship will be offered to outstanding applicants from both within and outside the EU. The Mundus MAPP is a prestigious two year Erasmus Mundus Masters in Public Policy program that allows students to study at top European universities. The program offers several mobility tracks, enabling students to specialize in different public policy fields across multiple institutions.

title: Central Queensland University 2025 RTP Scholarship For International Students
description: RTP Stipend Scholarships are funded by the Australian Government. They provide funding allocated to students to assist with their living costs while undertaking a research higher degree.The Scholarship is Fully Funded and available to Pursue Masters and Doctoral Degree by Research. Almost all Academic Fields are available at the university for the Master Degree & PhD Degree to all Students from all over the world.

title: USTC 2025 Masters Scholarship for International Students
description: The University of Science and Technology of China  USTC  Scholarship Program is a prestigious opportunity that aims to attract talented international students to study at one of China s most renowned universities. The scholarship is designed to support students from

title: USTC 2025 Undergraduate Scholarship for International Students
description: The University of Science and Technology of China  USTC  Scholarship Program is a prestigious opportunity that aims to attract talented international students to study at one of China s most renowned universities. The scholarship is designed to support students from

title: Trent University 2025 Scholarship Program for Undergraduate Students Worldwide
description: The Trent University Scholarship is awarded to entering international students who demonstrate outstanding academic achievement, community service, leadership potential, and some financial need. Trent University offers a wide range of scholarship opportunities for undergraduate students starting in January  Winter , May  Summer , or September  Fall  2025. These scholarships recognize academic excellence, leadership, community service, and financial need, ensuring that high achieving students can thrive at Trent.

title: Afreximbank Group 2025 Internship Program for African Students
description: Afreximbank Group comprises of the African Export  Import Bank  Afreximbank  , the Fund for Export Development of Africa  FEDA , a private equity subsidiary, , the Pan African Payments and Settlements System  PAPSS  and Afrexinsure, a captive insurance subsidiary. The African Export Import Bank  Afreximbank  is a Multilateral Financial Institution established to finance and promote intra and extra  African trade. The shareholders comprise African governments, African private and institutional investors, and non African private and institutional investors. The Internship is open to students who are nationals of the Bank s member countries, a list of which is available on the Bank s website; students of African descent in the diaspora and non African students whose vision for the transformation of Africa resonates with the mission of the Afreximbank Group. The programme attracts highly qualified candidates—entry into the programme based on merit.

title: 2024 TecHERdemy Skills Training by Federal Government of Nigeria
description: The Federal Ministry of Women Affairs is partnering with TD Africa to offer the 2024 TecHERdemy Skills Training Program to young Nigerians. The Ministry of Women Affairs TecHERdemy Training seeks to train 400 Nigerian young women in tech skills that are in demand in today s world while also offering them job and internship placements. TecHERdemy is a groundbreaking initiative designed to empower young Nigerian women with the essential tech skills needed to thrive in today s digital age.In partnership with the Ministry of Women Affairs, we re offering 400 women the opportunity to learn from industry experts and gain hands on experience in cybersecurity, data science, AI, and software development.

title: University Of Gothenburg  2025 Axel Adler Scholarship for International Students
description: Axel Adler Scholarship 2025 is a tuition fee waiver and is awarded to students studying international Master s or Bachelor s Programmes at the University of Gothenburg. The selection of scholars is primarily based on the applicant s qualifications in regard to the study programme. Axel Adler Scholarship is funded by Adlerbertska Scholarship Foundation and Adlerbertska Grant Foundation and the Swedish Council for Higher Education  UHR .

title: American University 2024 Next AU Emerging Global Leader Scholar
description: The AU Emerging Global Leader Scholarship  AU EGLS  promotes educational access and opportunity while enhancing international

title: Call For Applications: WACSI 2024 Next Generation Internship Programme
description: The West Africa Civil Society Institute  WACSI  is inviting young graduates and early career professionals from Nigeria , Senegal , and Cape Verde to apply for its Next Generation Internship Programme  NGIP . This six month internship aims to develop the next generation of African leaders by providing hands on experience in WACSI s core areas of Capacity Development, Policy Influencing and Advocacy, and Knowledge Management. Interns will actively participate in WACSI s activities, enhancing their civic awareness and professional skills to address critical development issues in West Africa.

title: Google 2024 Growth Academy: AI for Cybersecurity
description: A hybrid program designed to support startups using AI to innovate responsibly in the cybersecurity market. The program will provide startups with the essential growth skills, internationalization strategies, and Google tools and products to help them scale. A three month program for the most promising startups using AI technology to grow and innovate responsibly in the Cybersecurity space, to provide them with essential growth skills, internationalization strategies, and Google tools and products to help them scale. Selected founders will work with a mix of Google and external industry experts in a series of workshops and will receive mentoring across strategy, sales, and partnerships. After the initial three months of core content, startups continue to receive product support and mentorship from Google to help them address their challenges. The kick off and graduation sessions will be held in person. The locations will be made public in the coming months.

title: FirstBank 2024 Fintech Innovators Pitch Programme
description: FirstBank Fintech Summit 6.0 FirstBank is hosting its 6th annual Fintech Summit with the theme  Banking on Partnerships . Scheduled to take place on the 13th & 14th of November 2024. It will feature a series of engaging sessions, keynote speeches, and networking opportunities. Fintech Innovators Pitch Program As part of this event, FirstBank is launching the Fintech Innovators Pitch Programme to support early stage fintech startups and foster innovation in the financial services ecosystem. The programme will provide selected startups with intensive training, mentorship. All towards the opportunity to pitch their solutions to FirstBank, investors, and industry leaders. Selected winners will receive support from FirstBank to bring their products to market, including strategic assistance, resources, and network access. Through this programme, FirstBank of Nigeria aims to foster innovation, collaboration, and growth in the Nigerian Fintech ecosystem.

title: SMEDAN 2024 One Local Government One Product (OLOP) Program
description: One Local Government One Product  OLOP  is a development initiative focused on driving economic growth and sustainability by identifying and promoting a unique product or industry within each local government area. The initiative aims to harness local resources, skills, and potential to create employment, stimulate economic activities, and improve livelihoods within communities. Through OLOP, stakeholders collaborate to select and develop a product or industry that showcases the region s strengths and heritage. This program is designed to identify and galvanize rural communities around their natural endowments for wealth creation. It also seeks to enhance the technical, technological, and business management skills of MSMEs.

title: Fund for Peace (FFP) 2025 Paid Remote Spring Internships
description: Are you passionate about conflict analysis, peacebuilding, and human rights? The Fund for Peace  FFP  is now accepting applications for its paid remote Spring 2025 internships, open to applicants from all nationalities. Running from January to May, this internship offers a unique opportunity to gain experience in conflict analysis, peacebuilding, and more, from anywhere in the world. Apply if you are interested in: Conflict Analysis Early Warning Peacebuilding Security Human Rights This internship is ideal for you, whether you re a graduate or undergraduate with significant, relevant experience.

title: Call For Applications: Aspire Coronation Trust (ACT) Foundation 2025 Grant Cycle for Organizations in Africa
description: Aspire Coronation Trust  ACT  Foundation is a grant making organization established in 2016 to support local, national and regional non – profit organizations working to address challenges and associated vulnerabilities across the African Continent. ACT Foundation seeks to promote broad based participation and partnership with other institutions and/or donor organizations aimed at building sustainable communities that provide innovative solutions to social, economic, and environmental challenges. They provide organizations with grants to ensure sustainable action in areas that align with our priority focus areas. We also guide our implementing partners through every step of the grant process so that they are not isolated. The focus areas include: Health: Malaria, cancer  breast, cervical, and prostate , maternal and child health Entrepreneurship: Vocational  education, skills acquisition, financial literacy, and inclusion Environment: Waste management, water, and sanitation Leadership: Youth leadership development, thought leadership Only projects within the four focus areas will be considered.

title: Boustany Foundation MBA Scholarship at Cambridge University 2025
description: The Cambridge MBA is one of the world s leading business programmes, taught at one of the world s most prestigious universities. Scholarship recipients become members of Pembroke College, the third oldest and one of the most highly regarded colleges. The Boustany MBA Cambridge Scholarship is granted once every two years for a one year course at Cambridge University, Judge Business School.

title: Erasmus Mundus 2025 EMMIR Scholarship for International Students
description: The Erasmus Mundus EMMIR Scholarship is a 2 year Master s Degree program that is based on the First Semester in Germany, the Second Semester in Norway, the Third Semester is a research based Internship and the fourth Semester is dedicated to the thesis. The European Master in Migration and Intercultural Relations  EMMIR  is the first African European Asian Erasmus Mundus Master Course in migration studies and is jointly run by a consortium of three African, four European, and two Asian partner institutions, facilitated by a wider network of associate partners. EMMIR is a unique study programme focusing on migration through an intercultural approach. It equips students with profound theoretical and methodological skills in migration studies and allows them to conduct fieldwork primarily in African, Asian and European contexts. It is designed as a multidisciplinary two year master s programme  120 ECTS  that addresses important contemporary issues in a still emerging field of study.

title: BOOST 2024 Undergraduate Scholarship for Nigerian Students
description: The Bolanle Olufolake Opeyokun Scholarship Trust provides educational scholarships to female students above the age of 16 years, who are Nigerian citizens looking to pursue undergraduate studies in any Nigerian university within the areas of Information and Computer Technology.

title: African Development Bank (AfDB0 2024 Fashionomics Africa Incubator and Accelerator Program
description: The African Development Bank Fashionomics Africa initiative s third online competition is offering $6,000 total in cash prizes, mentoring, new branding packages and other support for winning African designers of sustainable and circular fashion. Fashionomics Africa, in collaboration with the United Nations Environment Programme, Parsons School of Design, strategic consulting and communications agency BPCM, and the Ellen MacArthur Foundation, invites interested African fashion brands to apply to the sustainable fashion online competition. Entrants must pursue environmentally friendly measures, sustainability, and circular economy actions to qualify. The competition targets textile, apparel, and accessories entrepreneurs from Africa, aged 18 years or older, who have launched fashion businesses  up to a maximum of 50 employees , and whose sustainable designs have been produced within the last five years. Qualifying applicants will submit pictures of their products, detail their sustainable business model, and explain how their startup is environmentally friendly and innovative.

title: Trust for Sustainable Living (TSL) 2025 International Schools Essay and Debate Competition
description: Since our first competition was launched in 2010, we have received over 14,000 essay and video entries from 120 countries, exploring topics from sustainability education, protecting bio

title: Deutsche Welle (DW) 2025/2026 International Journalism Traineeship
description: The 18 month paid journalism program is considered one of the most prestigious of its kind in Germany – and beyond. It covers a range of fields and skills, such as TV moderation, multimedia storytelling, data journalism and working with AI tools. The topics are explored in seminars and workshops at DW s editorial offices in Bonn and Berlin, along with our regional bureaus across the globe. For the traineeship, DW is looking for open minded and critical thinking in

title: African Development Bank (AfDB) 2024 Capacity Building Workshop for Higher Education Institutions (HEIs)
description: Welcome to the application form of the Capacity Building Workshop for Higher Education Institutions  HEIs , Enterprise Support Organisations within HEIs, Research Centres and Stakeholders in the HEIs entrepreneurship ecosystem in Africa. This training workshop is an initiative of the African Development Bank  AfDB  s Innovation and Entrepreneurship Lab  The Lab , with funding from the European Commission and the Swiss State Secretariat for Economic Affairs  SECO . The project titled:  Leveraging Research, STEM, Business Management and Training Capabilities of Higher Education Institutions  HEIs  and Research Centres for Strengthening Innovation and Entrepreneurship Ecosystem  aims to enhance the enterprise support activities of African HEIs by sharing best practices and successes within the African ecosystem and fostering collaboration across various regions in the continent.

title: 2025 Cambridge Africa Changemakers Scholarship at University of Cambridge
description: The Cambridge Africa Changemakers Scholarship is a programme of full cost scholarships for PhD students in any subject, open to candidates from any country in Africa. It is tenable at any college. It aims to provide support to talented students who require financial assistance to take up their places at the University, whose research research contributes to the development of the Continent and to climate resilient and sustainable futures for Africa and the world.

title: Federal Government 2024 Presidential CNG Initiative (Distribution of 2,000 Powered Tricycles)
description: In line with the President s Renewed Hope Agenda, this initiative reflects President Bola Ahmed Tinubu s unwavering commitment to empowering Nigerians, particularly the youth. Through innovative programs like the Presidential CNG Initiative, we are laying the foundation for a sustainable, self reliant future by lowering transportation costs, creating jobs, and promoting clean energy solutions. The distribution of 2,000 CNG powered tricycles is a significant step toward achieving economic growth and environmental responsibility, as envisioned in the Renewed Hope Agenda. This initiative also underscores the government s dedication to reducing the cost of living for everyday Nigerians while simultaneously fostering entrepreneurship. By transitioning the transport sector to Compressed Natural Gas  CNG , we aim to create a greener, more affordable public transportation system. This program is a testament to the administration s focus on job creation, sustainable development, and youth empowerment, ensuring that Nigeria s future is built on resilience, innovation, and shared prosperity.

title: NITDA  2024 Cyber Security Training for Young Nigerians
description: NITDA wishes to invite applications from suitably qualified Nigerians who are interested to enroll in the Cyber Security Program. The campaign is aimed at marking Cyber Security Awareness month and collaborating with Cisco to train Nigerians to be safer and protected while on the cyber world by taking the unlisted courses as follows: Introduction to Cybersecurity Cyber Threat Management Endpoint Security Network Defense Ethical Hacker. This is according to the Agency s strategic vision for developing digital literacy skills and ensuring the penetration of such skills among Nigerians.

title: LSETF/USADF 2024 Autogig Certified Foundation Training (ACFT) For Young Nigerians
description: The Lagos State Employment Trust Fund in partnership with USADF is organizing a free training in Autogig Certified Foundation Training  ACFT  For Young Nigerians and applications are being welcomed from qualified applicants. Ignite your future in Automotive Engineering. Join the 3 month Auto Foundation Technical Training Today.

title: Lagos State Employment Trust Fund (LSETF) Honey Treat Trade Academy (HTA) 2024 Construction Training Program
description: The Honeytreat Trade Academy  HTA  in partnership with Lagos State Employment Trust Fund  LSETF  is organizing a free training program in construction for artisans. Honeytreat Trade Academy  HTA  is a private indigenous institute that focuses on empowerment in skill acquisition within construction space to reduce the rate of unemployment in Nigeria. HTA is an institute driven with excellence in building competence and technological suaveness in construction trade. We engage Learners in intensive hand on practical training on construction trades like; Carpentry, Painting and Decorative Works, Masonry, Plumbing and Pipe Fitting, Electrical Wiring and Installation, Welding and Fabrication. All in line with National Skills Qualification level 1,2 and 3 scheme as supervised and powered by the Nigeria Institute of Building  NIOB . We are currently in partnership with BOSCH, NIOB, LSETF, to mention few. The following are the courses to be treated: Tiling and brickwork Woodwork and cabinet making Domestic water supply and waste management Domestic power supply and solar installation

title: University of Ottawa 2025 Undergraduate Scholarships for African Students
description: The University of Ottawa is thrilled to introduce the Entrance & Excellence Scholarships, a groundbreaking initiative aimed at supporting African students in pursuing higher education opportunities in Canada. This program offers eligible candidates a four year scholarship, effectively easing the financial burden associated with university tuition fees. The University of Ottawa takes immense pride in its

title: Odi-Olowo/Ojuwoye LCDA 2024 Free ICT Training For Young Nigerians
description: Our 4th Cohort of Free ICT Training propels you forward with targeted courses in Full Stack Web Development, Graphics & Animations, and Desktop Publishing, amplify your skills!!!

title: US Government 2025 TechGirls Summer Exchange Program
description: TechGirls is a U.S. based summer exchange program designed to empower and support young women  ages 15 17  from the United States and select countries around the world to pursue higher education and careers in science, technology, engineering, and math  STEM  fields through hands on skills development training. The core of the TechGirls program is a 23 day experience in the United States. In partnership with Virginia Tech, participants engage in an interactive tech camp that provides an in depth examination of cutting edge technologies and various educational and professional paths in STEM fields. Then, TechGirls travel to a city around the USA  Austin, Cincinnati, Denver, Detroit, Kansas City, or Seattle  for community immersion and STEM career exploration. The TechGirls programming yields a multiplier effect as participants return home to conduct community based projects with seven months of mentorship.

title: Sahara Group 2025 Graduate Management Trainee Program for Nigerian Graduates
description: The Sahara Group Graduate Management Trainee Program identifies and develops future leaders to drive Sahara Group s business growth aspirations. The Sahara Group GMT Program is a career boost for recent graduates and young professionals who have the potential and desire to become future leaders at Sahara. It s a 6 month program that combines theoretical business know how with practical application on the job. The program is largely experiential, focusing on developing meaningful and impactful skills. It includes foundational skills training, assignments and rotations, stretch projects, coaching, and mentoring—ultimately making you globally competitive.

title: UBA Foundation 2024 National Essay Competition for Nigerian Students (7.5 Million Naira in Prizes)
description: The National Essay Competition, targeted at senior secondary students in Nigeria, is organised annually, as part of UBA Foundation s education initiative which aims to promote the reading culture and encourage healthy and intellectual competition amongst secondary school students in Nigeria and across Africa. Essay Topic: The Impact of Carbon Emission on Climate Change in Nigeria: Discuss the Challenges and Profer Solutions
